body:
Alter Proc dbo.Sp_Rn_Planning_MergeWorkOrders_Cancel
    @WorkOrderId NVarchar(Max), @sssip Int
As
Set NoCount On

Begin
    /*
        Yazan	: renium
        Tarih	: 27.01.2025
        Açıklama:
    */
    Begin Try
        Declare @IsMergedPlan Int

        Declare @SelectedValues Table (Id Int)

        -- @RequestItemId parametresinden gelen ; ile ayrılmış değerleri @SelectedRequests tablosuna insert et
        If @WorkOrderId Is Not Null And LEN(@WorkOrderId) > 0 Begin
            Insert  @SelectedValues (Id) Select CAST(value As Int)From  STRING_SPLIT(@WorkOrderId, ';')Where RTRIM(
                                                                                                             value) <> ''
        End

        If Not Exists (Select   1 From  @SelectedValues) Begin
            Raiserror('Seçim yapılmamıştır.', 16, 1)
        End

        Update  PWOOWS
        Set     PWOOWS.GroupNo = SL.Id, PWOOWS.IsMergedPlan = 0, PWOOWS.ByPassTrig = PWOOWS.ByPassTrig
        From    dbo.Tb_Rn_Planning_WorkOrders PWOOWS
                Inner Join @SelectedValues SL On
                           SL.Id = PWOOWS.WorkOrderId
    End Try
    Begin Catch
        Declare @ObjectName NVarchar(126);

        Set @ObjectName = OBJECT_NAME(@@PROCID);

        Exec dbo.SP100_GenerateError @ObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
